areas.name: Swimming
areas.description: Master the art of swimming and improve your fitness.
areas.gainDescription: By completing this area, you'll enhance your swimming skills, build endurance, and improve overall fitness.

tasks: Day 1: Learn basic water safety and pool rules.
Day 2: Get comfortable in the water; submerge your face and blow bubbles.
Day 3: Practice floating on your back and stomach.
Day 4: Learn proper kicking techniques using a kickboard.
Day 5: Combine floating and kicking; move across the pool with assistance.
Day 6: Learn basic arm movements for freestyle stroke.
Day 7: Rest and review all skills learned this week.
Day 1: Practice freestyle arm movements with kicking.
Day 2: Learn side breathing techniques; practice with assistance.
Day 3: Combine breathing with freestyle stroke in short distances.
Day 4: Swim 25 meters freestyle without stopping.
Day 5: Learn backstroke basics; practice arm and leg coordination.
Day 6: Swim 25 meters backstroke.
Day 7: Rest and reflect on progress.
Day 1: Improve freestyle technique; focus on body rotation.
Day 2: Increase endurance; swim 50 meters freestyle.
Day 3: Learn breaststroke kick and arm movements separately.
Day 4: Combine breaststroke movements; swim short distances.
Day 5: Practice diving techniques from the poolside.
Day 6: Swim 50 meters combining different strokes.
Day 7: Rest and plan goals for next week.
Day 1: Learn butterfly kick (dolphin kick) basics.
Day 2: Practice butterfly arm movements on land and in water.
Day 3: Attempt full butterfly stroke in short distances.
Day 4: Swim 75 meters freestyle; focus on consistent breathing.
Day 5: Practice flip turns for freestyle and backstroke.
Day 6: Swim 100 meters combining all strokes learned.
Day 7: Celebrate progress and set future swimming goals.

areas.name: Meditation
areas.description: Develop a consistent meditation practice for mental clarity.
areas.gainDescription: By completing this area, you'll enhance mindfulness, reduce stress, and improve emotional well-being through regular meditation.

tasks: Day 1: Meditate for 5 minutes focusing on your breath.
Day 2: Practice deep breathing exercises for relaxation.
Day 3: Create a quiet meditation space in your home.
Day 4: Meditate for 7 minutes; focus on body scanning.
Day 5: Practice mindful walking for 10 minutes outdoors.
Day 6: Meditate for 7 minutes using a guided meditation app.
Day 7: Reflect on your first week in a meditation journal.
Day 1: Increase meditation time to 10 minutes; focus on thoughts passing by.
Day 2: Try a loving-kindness meditation for self-compassion.
Day 3: Practice mindful eating during a meal.
Day 4: Meditate for 10 minutes; focus on sounds around you.
Day 5: Attend a local meditation or yoga class.
Day 6: Practice mindfulness during routine activities.
Day 7: Journal about changes you've noticed this week.
Day 1: Meditate for 15 minutes; focus on emotions without judgment.
Day 2: Explore different meditation techniques (e.g., mantra meditation).
Day 3: Practice mindful listening in conversations.
Day 4: Meditate outdoors; connect with nature.
Day 5: Try a body scan meditation before bed.
Day 6: Meditate for 15 minutes; focus on gratitude.
Day 7: Reflect on your journey and set intentions.
Day 1: Meditate for 20 minutes; practice visualization.
Day 2: Incorporate affirmations into your meditation.
Day 3: Practice mindfulness during a creative activity (e.g., drawing).
Day 4: Explore guided meditations on topics of interest.
Day 5: Meditate in a group setting or online session.
Day 6: Review your meditation journal; note progress.
Day 7: Plan how to maintain your practice long-term.

areas.name: Coding (Frontend and React)
areas.description: Build your frontend development skills and learn React.
areas.gainDescription: By completing this area, you'll gain proficiency in frontend development and React, enabling you to build dynamic web applications.

tasks: Day 1: Set up your development environment (install VSCode, Node.js).
Day 2: Learn HTML basics; create a simple webpage with headings and paragraphs.
Day 3: Learn CSS basics; style your webpage with colors and fonts.
Day 4: Learn JavaScript basics; write a script to display an alert.
Day 5: Complete an online tutorial on HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Day 6: Build a personal homepage combining HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Day 7: Review and practice; plan for next week's topics.
Day 1: Learn about version control; set up Git and GitHub.
Day 2: Learn Git basics; commit your project to a GitHub repository.
Day 3: Study CSS Flexbox; create a layout using Flexbox.
Day 4: Learn about CSS Grid; practice creating complex layouts.
Day 5: Make your website responsive using media queries.
Day 6: Explore CSS frameworks like Bootstrap or Tailwind CSS.
Day 7: Reflect on your progress; prepare for learning React.
Day 1: Learn the basics of React; understand components and JSX.
Day 2: Set up a React project using Create React App.
Day 3: Learn about props and how to pass data between components.
Day 4: Study state management with useState hook.
Day 5: Build a simple todo app in React.
Day 6: Learn about useEffect hook for side effects.
Day 7: Review your React app; identify areas for improvement.
Day 1: Learn about React Router for navigation.
Day 2: Implement routing in your React app.
Day 3: Study context API for global state management.
Day 4: Learn about fetching data from APIs with Axios or Fetch API.
Day 5: Integrate an external API into your React app.
Day 6: Deploy your React app using Netlify or Vercel.
Day 7: Reflect on your learning journey; set future goals.
